snippet: The attack is part of a violent campaign that has taken a serious toll on soldiers and police officers across Afghanistan in recent months.
abstract: Taliban ambush in northern Afghanistan kills 14 members of Afghan security forces; attack is latest example of deadly campaign of violence that has taken serious toll on soldiers and police officers across the country.
lead_paragraph: The attack is part of a violent campaign that has taken a serious toll on soldiers and police officers across Afghanistan in recent months.

headline.main: Ambush by the Taliban Kills 14 in Afghan Forces
headline.print_headline: Ambush by the Taliban Kills 14 in Afghan Forces
